name: n8n-nodes-base.gitlabTrigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when GitLab events occur

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

options.name: Comment
options.description: Triggered when a new comment is made on commits, merge requests, issues, and code snippets

options.name: Confidential Comments
options.description: Triggered when a confidential comment is made

options.name: Deployments
options.description: Triggered when a deployment starts/succeeds/fails/is cancelled

options.name: Issue
options.description: Triggered when a new issue is created or an existing issue was updated/closed/reopened

options.name: Job
options.description: Triggered on status change of a job

options.name: Merge Request
options.description: Triggered when a new merge request is created, an existing merge request was updated/merged/closed or a commit is added in the source branch

options.name: Pipeline
options.description: Triggered on status change of Pipeline

options.name: Push
options.description: Triggered when you push to the repository except when pushing tags

options.name: Release
options.description: Release events are triggered when a release is created or updated

options.name: Tag
options.description: Triggered when you create (or delete) tags to the repository

options.name: Wiki Page
options.description: Triggered when a wiki page is created, updated or deleted
Any time any event is triggered (Wildcard Event)
